text: Berdyash Russky () is a rural locality (a selo) in Ivano-Kuvalatsky Selsoviet, Zilairsky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 13 as of 2010. There is 1 street. == Geography == It is located 40 km from Zilair, 12 km from Ivano-Kuvalat. == References == Category:Rural localities in Zilairsky District
title: Berdyash Russky
